message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $180?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $220, which is a bit lower than my initial offer, but still a great value for this unique item. What do you think?
I understand that you need to make a profit, but $220 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $200?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $210, which is a bit lower than my previous offer. What do you think?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to consider a price of $190?
I think we're really close now, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting this product. I'm willing to meet you at $205, which is a compromise between our previous offers. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $185?

I'm not going to give up yet, Bob! I think this product is worth more than what you're offering, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. I can do $195, which is a bit higher than your last offer. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my last counteroffer. Would you consider a price of $190?
